# Bootstrap elements (Polymer based)

## Description
Bootstrap classes piss me off.  
```html
<button class="btn btn-lg btn-red btn-go-and-fuck-your-self my-class">
</button>
```

Solution? Web Components   

```html
<btn-large class="my-class">
</btn-large>
```

No more kilometric attributes.  

## Usage  
`TODO`  

## List of elements  

### Buttons
- `btn-base`
- `btn-block`
- `btn-danger`
- `btn-info`
- `btn-link`
- `btn-primary`
- `btn-success`
- `btn-warning`

### Alerts  
- `alert-base`
- `alert-danger`
- `alert-info`
- `alert-success`
- `alert-warning`

### Wells  
- `well-base`
- `well-large`
